description:
Generally we are very busy with our life style. You might forget some tasks like carrying pen or going to bank or etc.

    Use this app you will never forget the uncompleted task’s.

    This application will allow you to add multiple categories like Bank, TODO, Office, or Home needs or shopping etc.

    You can add unlimited categories.

    In home screen you will find the summary of your tasks completed in the category and pending task’s to do. And it will shows the count of how many checklist item’s are related to high priority, medium priority and low priority.
    By using this app you can filter the check list items by Completed, Not completed, All, medium priority, high priority, low priority, etc..,
    This app will allow you to add, edit, delete the checklist at any point of the time.
    You can reset the checklist at any point of the time.
